00173 void CreateConfirmButtons( void )
00174 {
00175       // create buttons for confirm screen
00176   
00177       giIMPConfirmButtonImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_2.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00178       giIMPConfirmButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( giIMPConfirmButtonImage[0], pImpButtonText[ 16 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00179                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00180                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00181                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00182                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 136 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 254 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00183                                                                                      BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPConfirmYes);
00184   
00185       giIMPConfirmButtonImage[1]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_2.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00186       giIMPConfirmButton[1] = CreateIconAndTextButton( giIMPConfirmButtonImage[ 1 ], pImpButtonText[ 17 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00187                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00188                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00189                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00190                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 136 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 314 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00191                                                                                      BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPConfirmNo);
00192  
00193  SetButtonCursor(giIMPConfirmButton[ 0 ], CURSOR_WWW);
00194  SetButtonCursor(giIMPConfirmButton[ 1 ], CURSOR_WWW);
00195     
00196       return;
00197 }

00215 BOOLEAN AddCharacterToPlayersTeam( void )
00216 {
00217 
00218       MERC_HIRE_STRUCT HireMercStruct;
00219 
00220 
00221       // last minute chage to make sure merc with right facehas not only the right body but body specific skills...
00222       // ie..small mercs have martial arts..but big guys and women don't don't
00223 
00224       HandleMercStatsForChangesInFace( );
00225 
00226       memset(&HireMercStruct, 0, sizeof(MERC_HIRE_STRUCT));
00227 
00228       HireMercStruct.ubProfileID = ( UINT8 )( PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ) ;
00229 
00230       if( fLoadingCharacterForPreviousImpProfile == FALSE )
00231       {
00232             // give them items
00233             GiveItemsToPC(    HireMercStruct.ubProfileID );
00234       }
00235 
00236 
00237       HireMercStruct.sSectorX                                                  = gsMercArriveSectorX;
00238       HireMercStruct.sSectorY                                                  = gsMercArriveSectorY;
00239       HireMercStruct.fUseLandingZoneForArrival = TRUE;
00240 
00241       HireMercStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver = TRUE;
00242 
00243       // indefinite contract length
00244       HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = -1;
00245 
00246       HireMercStruct.ubInsertionCode      = INSERTION_CODE_ARRIVING_GAME;
00247       HireMercStruct.uiTimeTillMercArrives = GetMercArrivalTimeOfDay( );
00248 
00249       SetProfileFaceData( HireMercStruct.ubProfileID , ( UINT8 ) ( 200 + iPortraitNumber ), uiEyeXPositions[ iPortraitNumber ], uiEyeYPositions[ iPortraitNumber ], uiMouthXPositions[ iPortraitNumber ], uiMouthYPositions[ iPortraitNumber ] );
00250 
00251       //if we succesfully hired the merc
00252       if( !HireMerc( &HireMercStruct ) )
00253       {
00254             return(FALSE);
00255       }
00256       else
00257       {
00258             return ( TRUE );
00259       }
00260 }

00263 void  BtnIMPConfirmYes(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00264 {
00265 
00266       // btn callback for IMP Homepage About US button
00267       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00268             return;
00269 
00270       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00271       {
00272              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00273       }
00274       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00275       {
00276             if( btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
00277             {
00278 
00279                   // reset button
00280                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00281 // Madd
00282 /*                if( LaptopSaveInfo.fIMPCompletedFlag )
00283                   {
00284                         // already here, leave
00285                         return;
00286                   }
00287 */
00288                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance < COST_OF_PROFILE )
00289                   {
00290                         // not enough
00291                 return;
00292                   }
00293 
00294                   // line moved by CJC Nov 28 2002 to AFTER the check for money
00295                   LaptopSaveInfo.fIMPCompletedFlag = TRUE;
00296 
00297                   // charge the player
00298                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook(IMP_PROFILE, (UINT8)(PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId), GetWorldTotalMin( ), - ( COST_OF_PROFILE ) );
00299       AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_CHARACTER_GENERATED, 0,GetWorldTotalMin( ), -1, -1 );
00300                   AddCharacterToPlayersTeam( );
00301                   
00302                   // write the created imp merc
00303                   WriteOutCurrentImpCharacter( ( UINT8 )( PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId ) );
00304             
00305                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00306                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_HOME_PAGE;
00307 
00308                   //Kaiden: Below is the Imp personality E-mail as it was.
00309 /*
00310                   // send email notice
00311                   //AddEmail(IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS, IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS_LENGTH, IMP_PROFILE_RESULTS, GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
00312                   AddFutureDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_DAY2_ADD_EMAIL_FROM_IMP, 60 * 7, 0, 2 );
00313 */
00314 
00315                   //Kaiden: And here is my Answer to the IMP E-mails only
00316                   // profiling the last IMP made. You get the results immediately
00317                   // But they should become different per different IMP.
00318                   AddEmail(IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS, IMP_EMAIL_PROFILE_RESULTS_LENGTH, IMP_PROFILE_RESULTS, GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
00319 
00320                   //RenderCharProfile( );
00321 
00322                   ResetCharacterStats();
00323 
00324                   //Display a popup msg box telling the user when and where the merc will arrive
00325                   //DisplayPopUpBoxExplainingMercArrivalLocationAndTime( PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID + LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId );
00326             
00327                   //reset the id of the last merc so we dont get the DisplayPopUpBoxExplainingMercArrivalLocationAndTime() pop up box in another screen by accident
00328                   LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.iIdOfMerc = -1;
00329             }
00330       }
00331       
00332 }

00409 void GiveItemsToPC( UINT8 ubProfileId )
00410 {
00411       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pProfile;
00412 
00413 
00414   // gives starting items to merc
00415       // NOTE: Any guns should probably be from those available in regular gun set
00416 
00417       pProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ubProfileId]);
00418 
00419 
00420       // STANDARD EQUIPMENT
00421 
00422       GiveIMPItems(pProfile, 100, IMP_DEFAULT);
00423       GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile, IMP_RANDOMDEFAULT);
00424       
00425 
00426       // kevlar vest, leggings, & helmet
00427 //    MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot(pProfile, VESTPOS, FLAK_JACKET, 100, 1);
00428 
00429       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bWisdom,IMP_WISDOM);
00430 
00431 
00432       //if ( PreRandom( 100 ) < (UINT32) pProfile->bWisdom )
00433       //{
00434       //    MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot(pProfile, HELMETPOS, STEEL_HELMET, 100, 1);
00435       //}
00436 
00437       // canteen
00438 //    MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot(pProfile, SMALLPOCK4POS, CANTEEN, 100, 1);
00439 
00440       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bMarksmanship,IMP_MARKSMANSHIP);
00441 
00442       
00443       //Give ANY imp the calico
00444 //    MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot( pProfile, HANDPOS, M950, 100, 1);
00445 
00446 
00447 
00448       //No ammo clip    MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot( pProfile, SMALLPOCK1POS, CLIP9_30, 100, 2);
00449 
00450       /*
00451       Ja25 IMP only gets 1 gun now
00452 
00453 
00454 
00455 
00456       if (pProfile->bMarksmanship >= 80)
00457       {
00458             // good shooters get a better & matching ammo
00459             MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot( pProfile, HANDPOS, MP5K, 100, 1);
00460             MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot( pProfile, SMALLPOCK1POS, CLIP9_30, 100, 2);
00461       }
00462       else
00463       {
00464             // Automatic pistol, with matching ammo
00465             MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot( pProfile, HANDPOS, BERETTA_93R, 100, 1 );
00466             MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot( pProfile, SMALLPOCK1POS, CLIP9_15, 100, 3 );
00467       }
00468       */
00469 
00470       // OPTIONAL EQUIPMENT: depends on skills & special skills
00471 
00472       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bMedical,IMP_MEDICAL);
00473 
00474       //if (pProfile->bMedical >= 60)
00475       //{
00476       //    // strong medics get full medic kit
00477       //    MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, MEDICKIT, 100, 1);
00478       //}
00479       //else
00480       //if (pProfile->bMedical >= 30)
00481       //{
00482       //    // passable medics get first aid kit
00483       //    MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, FIRSTAIDKIT, 100, 1);
00484       //}
00485 
00486       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bMechanical,IMP_MECHANICAL);
00487 
00488       //if (pProfile->bMechanical >= 50)
00489       //{
00490       //    // mechanics get toolkit
00491       //    MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, TOOLKIT, 100, 1);
00492       //}
00493 
00494       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bExplosive,IMP_EXPLOSIVE);
00495 
00496       //if (pProfile->bExplosive >= 50)
00497       //{
00498       //    // loonies get TNT & Detonator
00499             //MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, TNT, 100, 1);
00500             //MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, DETONATOR, 100, 1);
00501       //}
00502 
00503       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bAgility,IMP_AGILITY);
00504       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bDexterity,IMP_DEXTERITY);
00505       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bStrength,IMP_STRENGTH);
00506       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bLifeMax,IMP_HEALTH);
00507       GiveIMPItems (pProfile,pProfile->bLeadership,IMP_LEADERSHIP);
00508 
00509       // check for special skills
00510       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, LOCKPICKING) && ( iMechanical ) )
00511       {
00512             //MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, LOCKSMITHKIT, 100, 1);
00513             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_LOCKPICKING);
00514       }
00515 
00516       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, HANDTOHAND))
00517       {
00518             //MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, BRASS_KNUCKLES, 100, 1);
00519             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_HTH);
00520       }
00521 
00522       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, ELECTRONICS) && ( iMechanical ) )
00523       {
00524             //MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, METALDETECTOR, 100, 1);
00525             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_ELECTRONICS);
00526       }
00527 
00528       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, NIGHTOPS))
00529       {
00530 //          MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, SILENCER, 100, 2);
00531             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_NIGHTOPS);
00532       }
00533 
00534       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, THROWING))
00535       {
00536 //          MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, THROWING_KNIFE, 100, 1);
00537             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_THROWING);
00538       }
00539 
00540       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, STEALTHY))
00541       {
00542 //          MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, SILENCER, 100, 1);
00543             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_STEALTHY);
00544       }
00545       
00546       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, KNIFING))
00547       {
00548 //          MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, COMBAT_KNIFE, 100, 1);
00549             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_KNIFING);
00550       }
00551 
00552       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, CAMOUFLAGED)) // TODO: Madd - other camouflage types, once we figure out a way to enable more traits
00553       {
00554 //          MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, CAMOUFLAGEKIT, 100, 1);
00555             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_CAMOUFLAGED);
00556       }
00557 
00558       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, AMBIDEXT))
00559       {
00560 //          MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile, M950, 100, 1);
00561             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_AMBIDEXTROUS);
00562       }
00563 
00564       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, MARTIALARTS))
00565       {
00566             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_MARTIALARTS);
00567       }
00568 
00569       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, ONROOF))
00570       {
00571             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_ROOFTOPS);
00572       }
00573 
00574       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, TEACHING))
00575       {
00576             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_TEACHING);
00577       }
00578 
00579       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, AUTO_WEAPS))
00580       {
00581             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_AUTOWEAPONS);
00582       }
00583 
00584       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, HEAVY_WEAPS ))
00585       {
00586             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_HEAVYWEAPONS);
00587       }
00588 
00589       if (PROFILE_HAS_SKILL_TRAIT(pProfile, THIEF ))
00590       {
00591             GiveIMPRandomItems(pProfile,IMP_THIEF);
00592       }
00593 }

00595 
00596 void MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pProfile, UINT16 usItem, UINT8 ubStatus, UINT8 ubHowMany)
00597 {
00598       INT32 iSlot;
00599 
00600       iSlot = FirstFreeBigEnoughPocket(pProfile, usItem);
00601 
00602       if (iSlot == -1)
00603       {
00604             // no room, item not received
00605             return;
00606       }
00607 
00608       // put the item into that slot
00609       MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot(pProfile, iSlot, usItem, ubStatus, ubHowMany);
00610 }
00611 
00612 
00613 void MakeProfileInvItemThisSlot(MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pProfile, UINT32 uiPos, UINT16 usItem, UINT8 ubStatus, UINT8 ubHowMany)
00614 {
00615   pProfile->inv[uiPos]                    = usItem;
00616   pProfile->bInvStatus[uiPos] = ubStatus;
00617   pProfile->bInvNumber[uiPos] = ubHowMany;
00618 }
00619 
00620 
00621 INT32 FirstFreeBigEnoughPocket(MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pProfile, UINT16 usItem)
00622 {
00623       UINT32 uiPos;
00624 
00625 
00626       // if it fits into a small pocket
00627       if (Item[usItem].ubPerPocket != 0)
00628       {
00629             // check small pockets first
00630             for (uiPos = SMALLPOCK1POS; uiPos <= SMALLPOCK8POS; uiPos++)
00631             {
00632                   if (pProfile->inv[uiPos] == NONE)
00633                   {
00634                         return(uiPos);
00635                   }
00636             }
00637       }
00638 
00639       // check large pockets
00640       for (uiPos = BIGPOCK1POS; uiPos <= BIGPOCK4POS; uiPos++)
00641       {
00642             if (pProfile->inv[uiPos] == NONE)
00643             {
00644                   return(uiPos);
00645             }
00646       }
00647 
00648 
00649       return(-1);
00650 }
00651 
00652 
00653 void WriteOutCurrentImpCharacter( INT32 iProfileId )
00654 {
00655       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WriteOutCurrentImpCharacter: IMP.dat"));
00656       char zImpFileName[13];
00657       strcpy(zImpFileName,IMP_MERC_FILENAME);
00658       strcat(zImpFileName,IMP_FILENAME_SUFFIX);
00659       WriteOutCurrentImpCharacter ( iProfileId, zImpFileName);
00660 
00661 
00662       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WriteOutCurrentImpCharacter: Nickname.dat"));
00663       
00664       char zFileName[13];
00665       char temp;
00666 
00667       for(int i=0;i < 9;i++) // Madd: I couldn't get strcpy or anything to work here... weird... if s/o wants to fix it, go ahead
00668       {
00669             temp = (char) gMercProfiles[iProfileId].zNickname[i];
00670             zFileName[i] = temp;
00671       }
00672 
00673       strcat(zFileName,IMP_FILENAME_SUFFIX);
00674 
00675       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WriteOutCurrentImpCharacter: %s", zFileName));
00676       WriteOutCurrentImpCharacter ( iProfileId, zFileName);
00677 }
00678 
00679 void WriteOutCurrentImpCharacter( INT32 iProfileId, STR fileName )
00680 {
00681       // grab the profile number and write out what is contained there in 
00682       HWFILE hFile;
00683       UINT32 uiBytesWritten = 0;
00684 
00685       // open the file for writing
00686       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WriteOutCurrentImpCharacter: %s", fileName));
00687       hFile = FileOpen(fileName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE);
00688 
00689       // write out the profile id
00690       if (!FileWrite(hFile, &iProfileId, sizeof( INT32 ), &uiBytesWritten))
00691       {
00692             return;
00693       }
00694 
00695       // write out the portrait id
00696       if (!FileWrite(hFile, &iPortraitNumber, sizeof( INT32 ), &uiBytesWritten))
00697       {
00698             return;
00699       }
00700 
00701       // write out the profile itself
00702       if (!FileWrite(hFile, &gMercProfiles[ iProfileId ], sizeof( MERCPROFILESTRUCT ), &uiBytesWritten))
00703       {
00704             return;
00705       }
00706 
00707       // close file
00708       FileClose(hFile);
00709 
00710       return;
00711 }

00713 BOOLEAN ImpExists ( STR nickName )
00714 {
00715       char zFileName[13];
00716 
00717       strcpy(zFileName,nickName);
00718       strcat(zFileName,IMP_FILENAME_SUFFIX);
00719 
00720       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ImpExists: %s", (STR) zFileName));
00721       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ImpExists: %d", FileExistsNoDB(zFileName) ));
00722 
00723       return FileExistsNoDB(zFileName);
00724 }
00725 
00726 void LoadImpCharacter( STR nickName )
00727 {
00728       INT32 iProfileId = 0;
00729       HWFILE hFile;
00730       UINT32 uiBytesRead = 0;
00731 
00732       char zFileName[13];
00733 
00734       strcpy(zFileName,nickName);
00735       strcat(zFileName,IMP_FILENAME_SUFFIX);
00736 
00737       // open the file for writing
00738       hFile = FileOpen(zFileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE);
00739 
00740       // valid file?
00741       if( hFile == -1 )
00742       {
00743             return;
00744       }
00745 
00746       // read in the profile
00747       if (!FileRead(hFile, &iProfileId,sizeof( INT32 ), &uiBytesRead))
00748       {
00749             return;
00750       }
00751 
00752       // read in the portrait
00753       if (!FileRead(hFile, &iPortraitNumber ,sizeof( INT32 ), &uiBytesRead))
00754       {
00755             return;
00756       }
00757 
00758       // read in the profile
00759       if (!FileRead(hFile, &gMercProfiles[ iProfileId ] ,sizeof( MERCPROFILESTRUCT ), &uiBytesRead))
00760       {
00761             return;
00762       }
00763 
00764       // close file
00765       FileClose(hFile);
00766       
00767       if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance < COST_OF_PROFILE )
00768       {
00769             // not enough
00770             return;
00771       }
00772       
00773 
00774       // charge the player
00775       // is the character male?
00776       fCharacterIsMale = ( gMercProfiles[ iProfileId ].bSex == MALE );
00777       fLoadingCharacterForPreviousImpProfile = TRUE;
00778       AddTransactionToPlayersBook(IMP_PROFILE,0, GetWorldTotalMin( ), - ( COST_OF_PROFILE ) );
00779   AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_CHARACTER_GENERATED, 0,GetWorldTotalMin( ), -1, -1 );
00780       LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId = iProfileId - PLAYER_GENERATED_CHARACTER_ID;
00781       AddCharacterToPlayersTeam( );
00782       AddFutureDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_DAY2_ADD_EMAIL_FROM_IMP, 60 * 7, 0, 2 );
00783       LaptopSaveInfo.fIMPCompletedFlag = TRUE;
00784       fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00785       fLoadingCharacterForPreviousImpProfile = FALSE;
00786 
00787       return;
00788 }

00792 void ResetIMPCharactersEyesAndMouthOffsets( UINT8 ubMercProfileID )
00793 {
00794   // ATE: Check boundary conditions!
00795   if( ( ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercProfileID ].ubFaceIndex - 200 ) > 16 ) || ( ubMercProfileID >= PROF_HUMMER ) )
00796   {
00797     return;
00798   }
00799 
00800       gMercProfiles[ ubMercProfileID ].usEyesX = uiEyeXPositions[ gMercProfiles[ ubMercProfileID ].ubFaceIndex - 200 ];
00801       gMercProfiles[ ubMercProfileID ].usEyesY = uiEyeYPositions[ gMercProfiles[ ubMercProfileID ].ubFaceIndex - 200  ];
00802 
00803 
00804       gMercProfiles[ ubMercProfileID ].usMouthX = uiMouthXPositions[ gMercProfiles[ ubMercProfileID ].ubFaceIndex - 200  ];
00805       gMercProfiles[ ubMercProfileID ].usMouthY = uiMouthYPositions[ gMercProfiles[ ubMercProfileID ].ubFaceIndex - 200  ];
00806 }

00808 
00809 void GiveIMPRandomItems( MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pProfile, UINT8 typeIndex )
00810 {
00811       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPRandomItems: typeIndex = %d",typeIndex ));
00812 
00813       UINT16 usItem = 0;
00814       INT32 iChoice;
00815 
00816       if ( gIMPItemChoices[ typeIndex ].ubChoices <= 0 )
00817             return;
00818 
00819       for ( int i=0; i < gIMPItemChoices[typeIndex].ubNumItems ;i++ )
00820       {
00821             while (usItem == 0 )
00822             {
00823                   iChoice = Random(gIMPItemChoices[ typeIndex ].ubChoices);
00824                   usItem = gIMPItemChoices[ typeIndex ].bItemNo[ iChoice ];
00825                   if (!ItemIsLegal(usItem))
00826                         usItem=0;
00827             }
00828             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPRandomItems: typeIndex = %d, usItem = %d ",typeIndex, usItem ));
00829             if ( usItem > 0 )
00830                   MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile,usItem,100,1);
00831 
00832             // give ammo for guns
00833             if ( Item[usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN && !Item[usItem].rocketlauncher )
00834             {
00835                   usItem = DefaultMagazine(usItem);
00836                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPRandomItems: give ammo typeIndex = %d, usItem = %d ",typeIndex, usItem ));
00837                   MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile,usItem,100,(1+Random(3)));
00838             }
00839 
00840             // give launchables for launchers
00841             if ( Item[usItem].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER )
00842             {
00843                   usItem = PickARandomLaunchable(usItem);
00844                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPRandomItems: give launchable typeIndex = %d, usItem = %d",typeIndex, usItem ));
00845                   MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile,usItem,100,(1+Random(3)));
00846             }
00847       }
00848 
00849 }
00850 
00851 void GiveIMPItems( MERCPROFILESTRUCT *pProfile, INT8 abilityValue, UINT8 typeIndex )
00852 {
00853       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPItems: typeIndex = %d, abilityValue = %d",typeIndex,abilityValue ));
00854 
00855       UINT16 usItem = 0;
00856       INT32 iChoice;
00857 
00858       if ( gIMPItemChoices[ typeIndex ].ubChoices <= 0 )
00859             return;
00860 
00861       iChoice = (UINT32) (abilityValue / (100 / gIMPItemChoices[ typeIndex ].ubChoices)) ;
00862 
00863       if ( iChoice >= gIMPItemChoices[ typeIndex ].ubChoices )
00864             iChoice = gIMPItemChoices[ typeIndex ].ubChoices - 1;
00865 
00866       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPItems: 1 iChoice = %d",iChoice));
00867       for ( int i=0; i < gIMPItemChoices[typeIndex].ubNumItems ;i++ )
00868       {
00869             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPItems: 2 iChoice = %d",iChoice));
00870             usItem = gIMPItemChoices[ typeIndex ].bItemNo[ iChoice ];
00871             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPItems: typeIndex = %d, usItem = %d, iChoice = %d, abilityValue = %d",typeIndex, usItem,iChoice, abilityValue ));
00872             if ( usItem > 0 && ItemIsLegal(usItem))
00873             {
00874                   MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile,usItem,100,1);
00875 
00876 
00877                   // give ammo for guns
00878                   if ( Item[usItem].usItemClass == IC_GUN && !Item[usItem].rocketlauncher )
00879                   {
00880                         usItem = DefaultMagazine(usItem);
00881                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPItems: give ammo typeIndex = %d, usItem = %d",typeIndex, usItem ));
00882                         MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile,usItem,100,(1+Random(3)));
00883                   }
00884 
00885                   // give launchables for launchers
00886                   if ( Item[usItem].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER )
00887                   {
00888                         usItem = PickARandomLaunchable(usItem);
00889                         DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("GiveIMPItems: give launchable typeIndex = %d, usItem = %d",typeIndex, usItem ));
00890                         MakeProfileInvItemAnySlot(pProfile,usItem,100,(1+Random(3)));
00891                   }
00892             }
00893             iChoice--;
00894             if (iChoice < 0)
00895                   iChoice = 0;
00896       }
00897 
00898 
00899 }
